Title: Relates to access to mental health care services for emergency dispatchers
Summary: Provides that a collective bargaining agreement or employment contract shall not require that an emergency dispatcher employed by a municipality obtain approval from, or provide notice to, a supervisor to access mental or behavioral health care services.
LawCode: Add ยง155, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to access to mental health care services for emergency dispatchers
